/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with traditional Chinese buildings, their architecture characterized by curved eaves and ornate details. These buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, contrast beautifully with the lush green trees that line the street. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the bustling cityscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, adding a touch of life to the scene. Cars are parked along the street, indicating a blend of traditional and modern elements in the city's daily life. The image is a beautiful representation of Beijing's unique blend of history and modernity.
